name: Pizza Pirates
description:
PIRATES TRYNA STEAL OUR FLOATING PIZZA 

castle tileset not mine: https://gtajima.itch.io/2d-platformer-tiles-castle
made in 3 non-consecutive hours (and 40-ish minutes trying to export) for the Godot Rumble Jam #0

controls:

WASD - move

LEFT-CLICK - Shoot pizza sauce

eat cheese to heal, eat tomato to run!!!!!
